AssetsBucketPrefix.Description: The prefix of the S3 bucket where the application WAR is located. A region-specific suffix will be appended, e.g. AssetsBucketPrefix-us-east-1.

VPCTemplateKey.Description: The key of the template for the VPC scaffold substack

VpcName.Description: Name of the VPC - Used to dynamically name the VPC, IGW, Routing Tables and Subnets.
VpcName.ConstraintDescription: Must be in ALL CAPS with only DASHES as the separator. Examples: DEV-ECS1, US1, STAGING-US1.

VpcCidr.Description: The whole VPC CIDR Block. Example: 10.0.0.0/16
VpcCidr.ConstraintDescription: Supports subnet sizes of /16 to /22 only. Input must be a correct CIDR, such as: 10.0.5.0/16

SubnetTemplate.Description: CF Template URL for creating Public/Private Subnets and NAT ASGs

VpcPublicSubnetA.Description: Public Subnet (A) CIDR. Leave empty to ignore AZ.

VpcPublicSubnetB.Description: Public Subnet (B) CIDR. Leave empty to ignore AZ.

VpcPublicSubnetC.Description: Public Subnet (C) CIDR. Leave empty to ignore AZ.

VpcPublicSubnetD.Description: Public Subnet (D) CIDR. Leave empty to ignore AZ.

VpcPublicSubnetE.Description: Public Subnet (E) CIDR. Leave empty to ignore AZ.

VpcPrivateSubnetA.Description: Private Subnet (A) CIDR. Leave empty to ignore AZ.

VpcPrivateSubnetB.Description: Private Subnet (B) CIDR. Leave empty to ignore AZ.

VpcPrivateSubnetC.Description: Private Subnet (C) CIDR. Leave empty to ignore AZ.

VpcPrivateSubnetD.Description: Private Subnet (D) CIDR. Leave empty to ignore AZ.

VpcPrivateSubnetE.Description: Private Subnet (E) CIDR. Leave empty to ignore AZ.

ResourcesTemplateKey.Description: The key of the template for the EB resources and application substack

DatabaseUser.ConstraintDescription: must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters.

AppTemplateKey.Description: The key of the template for that contains the EB app and env embedded in ResourcesTemplateKey

ApplicationName.Description: The name of the Elastic Beanstalk Application

InstanceType.Description: The type of instance to use for EB app servers

WarKey.Description: The key of the application WAR file in the WarBucket

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the Elastic Beanstalk and Bastion hosts

BastionInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

SSHFrom.Description: Lockdown SSH access to the bastion host (default can be accessed from anywhere)
SSHFrom.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
